channel.title: Level limit 317 delta
channel.description: Hi how would I change the max skill level and combat level every player can reach in my server? I am using a 317 delta. YOur help would be most appreciated :)

item.title: Level limit 317 delta
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

demps2k9:

In client.java search for 200000000 and change that to whatever max xp you are wanting, then search 131 until you come to a code that says 131 and a few more digits, and has has max level < 99, or something like that in the code too. Then change that to what you want the max level to be.

ok thanks

Read full topic
